data.title: Omsk weather forecast, climate chart: temperature, humidity (average
data.meta_description: Omsk current conditions, weather forecast and climate chart (temperature and humidity). Omsk free weather widget (free script for your website or blog). Omsk weather conditions, average/minimum/maximum temperature, humidity variation graphs. Omsk local time, GMT offset and weather information.

Weather Station: Omsk (latitude 54-58N, longitude 073-18E)

Local Time:

Omsk is in the "Asia/Omsk" timezone.

The "Asia/Omsk" timezone uses a Standard Time (ST) / Daylight Saving Time (DST) alternation scheme, and it currently is in ST (since Sunday, 26 October 2014, 01:00 AM local time). During ST, the offset to Universal Time (UTC, GMT or Zulu) is +6:00 hours.

Omsk will exit standard time (entering DST) on Tuesday, 19 January 2038, at 09:14 AM local time, when clocks will be turned forward 0 hour to Tuesday, 19 January 2038, 09:14 AM local daylight time. During DST, the offset to UTC will be +6:00 hours.
